data.event: The selo of Nazarovo was founded in 1700 by Nazary Patyukov, a Cossack, and was named after him.

event.title: 1888, deposits of brown coal were discovered

data.event: In 1888, deposits of brown coal were discovered in the vicinity of the village, and in 1925 a railroad was built through it.
In 1888, deposits of brown coal were discovered in the vicinity of the village, and in 1925 a railroad was built through it.

event.title: was granted urban-type settlement status in 1946

data.event: The selo was granted urban-type settlement status in 1946 and town status in 1961.
Опубликован: "Ведомости высших органов государственной власти Красноярского края", №33(404), 5 июля 2010 г.

event.title: June 10, 2010 On the Registry of the Administrative-Territorial Units and the Territorial Units of Krasnoyarsk Krai, as amended

data.event: (Legislative Assembly of Krasnoyarsk Krai. Law #10-4765 of June 10, 2010 On the Registry of the Administrative-Territorial Units and the Territorial Units of Krasnoyarsk Krai, as amended by the Law #7-3007 of December 16, 2014 On Changing the Administrative-Territorial Structure of Bolsheuluysky District and on Amending the Krai Law "On the Registry of the Administrative-Territorial Units and the Territorial Units of Krasnoyarsk Krai". Effective as of July 1, 2010.).
